body: And thats it folks, cus fuck know why this Series and alike (KissXSis...) got so much potential already in place by their own Authora for a good while supply of H-Doujinshi and we got fuck all even till now. Why the shunned cold-shoulders by the Community? Can someone cares enough to explain? Even shitty JAnime those are rated General with not even a panties scene got like 100+ H-Doujinshi on them.
